adHeader: Painting specials!!! $150 a room w/free baseboard repaint!!!
adDetails: Hello my name is Christopher and I have been a professional painter for 10yrs now. I have worked with a lot of General contractors such as Shappel industries northern california, kb homes, vkw renovations( Texas) greenhouse builders( Texas) and many more. I have also done work as my own company during this time. I have all the experience necessary to complete any size job you throw my way. I have all my own tools and a go to attitude that will make your project less stressful. I am also available to do other work such as flooring, cabinets, basic electrical and plumbing and more. Dont be afraid to ask if i can handle it. So if a free estimate/consultation is what you are looking for then please feel free to give me a call. Contact number show contact info Text or call, or email to the provided cl email address and i will respond asap.
